text: Babe Ruth (1895–1948) was an American baseball outfielder and pitcher who played 22 seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB), from 1914 to 1935. Babe Ruth may also refer to: *Babe Ruth (band), an English band *Babe Ruth Award, a baseball award *Babe Ruth (film), a 1991 American drama film ==See also== *Babe Ruth's called shot, a famous home run *Babe Ruth League, a youth baseball program *Baby Ruth, a candy bar *The Babe Ruth Story, a 1948 biographical film
title: Babe Ruth (disambiguation)
